txt.en: 'Uh-hem, my dear gentle hobbits! Yes, I think this will do nicely.'
'Are you going to be done soon?'
'There we are, just a few more trips, and I'll be done with my task.'
'I've a few more to hang after this one. Would you rather I not hang them?'
'No, no, don't be foolish. Everything needs to be perfect, or Lobelia will throw a fit! Hang the rest and be quick about it.'
'Looks like the fireworks will be starting soon. It is well worth the wait!'
'The fireworks show is starting now, just south of Party Tree over there. Should be a grand show!'
'A grand show indeed! I'm sure there will be another show soon.'
'Well that is all the fireworks for the night. Just lovely!'
'All of these tables must be immaculate for the party!'
'Even this one? It's all the way in the back, behind the tree!'
'Well, it won't be easy with those children who keep sneaking in every night.'
